section_text: 1 This Act may be cited as the Entail (Scotland) Act, 1914.

section_title: Entail Act, 1685, not to apply to future deeds.
section_text: 2   No   deed relating to land in Scotland dated after the passing of this Act  shall be effective   to entail such land, and no such deed shall be recorded in the register of entails; and any prohibition of alienation, contracting debt, or altering the order of succession,  ... in any such deed shall be null and void: ... . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

section_title: Effect of death of heir of entail in possession on subsisting lease of mansion house.
Contract for the sale of growing timber.
Application of sections 47, 48, and 49 of 11 & 12  Vict.  c. 36.

section_text: 10 In this Act ... the word “ land ” shall include all heritages ....
